Discord
Controls: Arrow keys to move, other keys to type. Enter to clear text.
Commands:
  • /color [hex color]: Change your color (e.g. /color 8800cc). Special colors allowed: rainbow
  • /shape [shape]: Change your shape. Shapes allowed: square, circle, triangle, hexagon, bowtie, sus, cross, sine, checker, check, plus, mover, generator, push, slide, pentagon, star, heart, diamond, arrow, crescent, bolt, shield, gear, octagon, tree, creeper, bob
    Usernames and coordinates show an arrow that points towards that position.
  • /admin: Enables admin mode. Requires a password. Players with admin mode have a rainbow outline. Admins can click on other players to kick them.
  • /bc [message]: Broadcast a message (admin only).
  • /goto [x] [y]: Jump to a given position.
  • /username [username]: Set your username.
  • /invis: Toggle invisibility (admin only).
  • /size [size]: Sets your size. Limited to 0.5 to 2 if not admin.
  • /tp [username]: Teleports to another user.
  • /speed [speed]: Sets your speed. Limited to -3 to 3 if not admin.
  • /players: Toggle showing player list.
  • /sudo [username] [command]: Run a command as another user (admin only). Example: /sudo MyName size 1
